'''Yuhua''' is an [[NPC]] at the [[Wangshu Inn]] in [[Dihua Marsh]], [[Liyue]]. She can be found next to the stairwell leading to the elevator to the left of the tree that Wangshu Inn is situated on.

Her twin sister is [[Xiuhua]], a waitress at the Baiju Guesthouse. From time to time, the two will switch places at their respective establishments.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Xiuhua}}</ref>

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Yuhua:''' Greetings! Are you in need of a meal, or a room for the night?
:{{DIcon}} Who are you?
::'''Yuhua:''' I am Yuhua, a waitress here at the Wangshu Inn.
::'''Yuhua:''' Nothing suspicious about me whatsoever.
::{{DIcon}} What's your role here?
:::'''Yuhua:''' I am a waitress at this establishment, or a server if you will. I'm afraid there's not much more to say than that.
::{{DIcon}} Tell me about the inn.
:::'''Yuhua:''' The Wangshu Inn is situated in a convenient location on one of the main thoroughfares that runs between Mondstadt and Liyue. Boasting pleasant accommodation at an affordable price, there is simply no better choice for passing travelers who need somewhere to stay the night.
:::'''Yuhua:''' Nothing suspicious about it whatsoever. Ahahahaha.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Yuhua:''' You are always welcome at the Wangshu Inn. Come by any time!
{{Dialogue end}}
